speech.text: Agmeus is a strong general but he is overaggressive. Use that to your advantage and you can defeat him easily.
I see light ahead! We need to move!
The Stabilizer will be heavily guarded, what is our approach?
Only the exhaust will be heavily guarded. We will only encounter random patrols along the Stabilizer. We get past them and we can surprise the fleet stationed in front of the exhaust.
Be careful navigating near the Stabilizer. There is a reason it is not heavily guarded.
Thanks for clearing out that front line for us. We'll take it from here.
That could take too long.  It is too risky to let him get back to his lab.
Halcyon, allow me to fight alongside you. I want to bring that poor excuse for a leader to justice.
No, you must ensure the launch is successful otherwise Phobos will be incomplete.
Everything is prepped. The only thing I can do is help you buy time.
I don't know what happened to Typhon though.
He remains trapped in Tartarus while he gathers power you send him. You must be perished.
More Xeno ships are entering the atmosphere!
We don't have much choice. What is it?
If I can get close enough, I can plant an explosive that will disrupt the core and weaken it for a final confrontation.
Damn! They've entrenched themselves outside the base. We'll have to blast our way through!
Rastax is defeated!
But the rest of the Xeno fleet is still firing at us..  We've taken too much damage already.
Setting a course for the Xeno homeworld. Hang on!
Looks like this is as close as we are getting, we've been discovered.
Hold them off. We have to get closer for weapons to lock on.
Shouldn't we get reinforcements?
The weather is jamming our communications, and we don't have time to wait for them. We finish this now.
Excelsitus is responsible for powering all the portals. If we take it out they all shut down and the invasion will be halted.
So how are we supposed to get back?
All units focus fire on Razogoth! Come on you maggots. You want to live forever?
Yes! Such power! Such strength! A new world will be born in my image!
The Nexus has unloc...
Fire with everything you have, boys! Bring this thing down!
Sir, more reports are coming in of another Raider vehicle inbound.
How does bringing the Prometheus Device to the Nexus threaten Acheron?
It will act as a key, releasing the stored energy in the Nexus. That power will wash over Acheron turning all living things to ash.
So the traitor emerges. If you were hoping to harvest the Pantheon's energy to use against me don't bother. The Righteous have it heavily guarded.
Only you would devise a plan so foul. The Pantheon must be destroyed and I will take you out with it if I have to.
We've entered the labs!
It is too late! Typhon Vex is cutting into the vaults below to obtain the Prometheus Device.
Halcyon is retreating in to the Sulfuris Pits. Never thought I would have my life saved by a Raider!
My life was in your debt. I repay my debts.
What's the matter Yurich? Couldn't finish the job? You'll burn for your incompetance!
Now what?
We have to find the source of the tremors, that is where it will emerge.
Evrane has fallen.
We have been carried far enough to begin the ritual. Shiva will incinerate this world.
This is a nightmare! It has to be!
Almost there. Charge the cannons.
We don't have enough charges to blow something of that size.
Then we will just keep firing until it comes down.
The Blightlands... it's so...
Overwhelming. The land itself hungers for flesh and blood.
This was Plan B? Stranding ourselves on a planet deserted of all life besides ravishing Bloodthirsty?
We need to find a shuttle to escape the planet and commandeer another Xeno ship and continue our mission.
You cannot see what we see. There is nothing more important right now. You are a fool to think otherwise.
Your insubordination has cross...
Tabitha out.
Katana! Katana, where are you?
Here... Yurich, look out behind you!
We did it! It is powering down.
No, it just finished what it was powering up for.
How long have the Xeno been attacking?
They started their assault a few days ago.
Protect the city. We need to stand against this monster!
Wait, what was that?
The Kraken!? We must be near its nesting area and the mass of Bloodthirsty drew it over.
Tabitha, Octane come in. What is taking so long? We need those Xeno parts before the Raiders can regroup and form another offensive.
Coward!
Let him run, protecting the Spire is our top priority.
A strange aura is blocking our shots. We cannot break through.
The time has come. You shall bear witness to the end.
If you insist. Just don't get yourself killed. You're too valuable at this point.
We finish this now.
He isn't going to like that.
Ha! I guess I'll just have to wait for my Honor Day.
Told you it was no use. Take them out.
Agmeus is moving into position. On my mark we surround him with full force.
Typhon Vex has retreated! We must find the vermin. Destroy all Raider bases in sight.
These Bloodthirsty are being stirred by the Broodmother.
It looks like they are being led by Raiders...but something is off.
They are corrupted by the Broodmother's influence.
We picked up strange subspace signals right before the Xeno began attacking.
And they've been falling from the skies since?
Yes, sir.
A squadron of their fleet is advancing while another has broken out of formation. They are going to attempt to flank us.
They think we'll be defeated by such amateur tactics. Prepare to defend.
Where is the old man? Where is Halcyon? I wanted to watch him suffer and die!
What is the Prometheus Device exactly?
Originally it was our weapon against the Bloodthirsty, but it didn't work. It only made them more powerful.
The resonance of the Prometheus Device and the Nexus must have awakened the Xeno from their cryo-sleep.
Raiders are flanking us!
Start a final sweep- What in the seven hells is that thing?!
Raiders? Here? Why aren't they being attacked by Bloodthirsty?
The Divine One?
It doesn't matter. Soon the Guardian will rise and put an end to your meddling.
Xeno have been spotted in this area working on some sort of satellite array.
The rest of Rastax's forces appear to be clearing out.
I'm bringing up the schematics for the Worldship now.
We'll be facing heavy resistance, but once we control Wyrmhold we'll have an advantage.
The Xeno will expect this shuttle to be filled with refugees. We'll take advantage of their surprise.
Try as you might, Halcyon, you and this world will burn!
Main cannons focus on the exhaust; secondary weapons keep the fleet off of us. We're bringing this Worldship down.
Alright, I'll take us in. Octane prepare the main cannons. We'll need to reroute all power on my command.
Do you hear that buzzing?
Bloodthirsty are dropping out of the sky!
With each step that thing shakes the ground!
Something's wrong... this ship is way over capacity for crew.  These Xeno aren't even armed.  They're not military - they're civilians.
This is foolish. You will die with the planet!
The Divine one, as they call it, won't just destroy all life on Acheron; it will destroy the planet.
Clear them out! I don't want a single Righteous remaining.
Tell us how to defeat Jotun!
The Pantheon made it indestructible, but Jotun is still more powerful than your entire army.
I need to get out of here!
How can you be sure?
It was our backup plan if the Stabilizer didn't bring the Worldship down.
Halcyon didn't give you enough credit, this mission was supposed to be easy.
Wouldn't be the first time he was wrong!
The Xeno have mobilized heavy units. They want to protect this thing at all costs.
We're here.  What now?
There is no way for us to defeat Razogoth.  We just need to distract it long enough to get a shuttle powered up.
I'll lead the attack on Razogoth. You work on getting us off this infected rock.
Waiting on your command. We can't get much closer.
All power to main cannons. Fire!
I am concerned about Vargas's threat.  I hope Phobos is worth it.
We admire your endurance, but even the strongest succumb to the ravages of the Blight.
We're getting close, prepare the assault.
This is our finest hour! Jotun does not break this line. Tonight we put a Sentinel back in the ground where it belongs.
Get ready...
You have failed this world! I will devour you and it.
You're nothing but a nightmare, show me what you've got.
We've managed to trace Typhon's path. He is headed toward Baron's Claw Labs.
We must prevent him from reaching the labs.
Get back!
Haha, you're only delaying the inevitable.
Hit it hard then fall back! The Bloodthirsty will be even more vicious near the Blightbloom.
The remains of the Worldship belong to the Imperials. This is an incredible victory.
It looks like we were beaten to it.
How is that possible? We beat everyone else back.
You will be cleansed by our divine weapons.
Is that tower what the Serapherus was guarding?
It has to be. Legend states Serapherus was guardian to the original Pantheon, the source of power for the Righteous and keeper of...
More Righteous. Is there an end to them?
Is that?
Jotun, the Sentinel born of the first Pantheon.
Charges have been placed, Commander.
Then let's get clear before this structure comes crumbling down.
How will you traitors stop Typhon if you couldn't do what was necessary?
This Righteous scum is useless, breakthrough him and get to the Jotun before he spreads his destruction to Ashrock.
That's enormous! It's bigger than a Sentinel.
Great Heimdal! Purge this land of the non-believers, so that we may prepare the tribute.
Sir, is this really the best use of our time? Trudging through such harsh conditions.
Our neocyte supplies are low, and previous excavation teams have gone missing. This mission is of utmost importance.
I think I figured out why those other teams went missing. We are surrounded by Righteous.
Good work, now execute the prisoners.
That's mad Sir, they're no threat. I refuse to carry out such a barbaric order.
If you're not with me, you're against me!
I assume Typhon plans to use it to activate the Nexus in the Wasteland. He wants the full destruction of Acheron.
There are larger threats than you out there. You need to learn your place.
Not only are we marching into the largest force of Bloodthirsty we have ever faced, it is led by that monstrosity?
Would you prefer to huddle in a cave waiting to die?
Abort the mission.
That will have to wait until after we have dealt with the Kraken.
Are we certain the Xeno could not track our warp signature?
The Scion believes they may detect the warp, but not what was transported.
Then let's complete our mission quickly before they can report.
Free the prisoners.
I will not stand this indignity. You will be punished for your treason!
Where is that rat, Typhon, hiding?! We must reach Relay Station X-8. It will allow us to track him.
Xeno!
What are they doing here?
They don't look right...
Their bodies show signs of long exposure to the neocyte. They aren't here for it - they have been protecting it all this time.
They could be protecting something else...
Katana, buy me some time. I'll set charges at the this exit and seal them in.
Where did these weapons come from?
They follow pre-fall Asphodel schematics. Typhon must have dug them up from the ruins in the wastes.
He's right Tabitha. If we stray off course we may never make it to the Worldship.
It is too risky, we are out gunned.
Which is why they won't expect it.
We either need to attack from a distance or take it out fast. We won't last too long near the Blightbloom.
Well, we are short on time anyway...
You did it! Aria, you're hurt.
It was worth it. I won't allow my creation to tarnish my honor as an Imperial. Imperials Forever!
Aria, NO!
What could Typhon want with abandoned labs?
Baron's Claw is not abandoned. It contains...something that cannot fall into Vex's hands.
She is dead, but the damage is done. Bloodthirsty across Acheron have been stirred.
Commander Halcyon! It's good to see you, We've recently come under siege by the Xeno.
The Xeno haven't been seen in twenty years!
We are drawing near to the final launch to complete the Phobos Orbital Cannon. Thank you Aria. If we didn't drag you away from the Red Maw we wouldn't have been successful.
It has been my pleasure Lord Halcyon. I'm proud to assist the glorious Imperials.
Halcyon! You've crossed the line for the last time. You'll pay for stealing my top weapons scientist for the purpose of enslaving my people.
Evrane is their Carrier. It is said only those that arrive to the holy site on its back will be taken to salvation.
So if we destroy that we might be able to stop this before it begins!?
The Righteous are the ancient enemy of the Bloodthirsty.
They must have thought that we were infected.
Vex, the fool. He released a powerful Bloodthirsty into the ranks of his own men to keep us distracted. The Broodmother will shred both our ranks.
Typhon no doubt retreated back to his homeland of Kor.
We managed to stop him from reaching the Nexus in the Wasteland. He may try and unlock the Blightlands Nexus.
How dare you set foot on Kor soil, Imperial scum.
That was pleasantly easier this time around. Then again, anything is easy compared to getting off that deathtrap of a planet.
We got lucky.  There were less civilians around to alert the command of our presence. We can't expect the rest of the way to be that easy.
We've stopped a Sentinel before and we'll do it again. Your efforts are worthless.
The power of the Sentinels pale in comparison to the power of the Divine one.
We've hurt Halcyon's armies badly. He'll have to stay here and lick his wounds.
That means it's up to us to stop Typhon before he reaches the Nexus.
You're lucky to be alive. Now get out of there and report back your findings.
Negative, if we don't deal with this threat now it will overrun Acheron.
Lucina must've been through here. Raiders, killed by gunfire.
Careful! Bodies of fallen Raiders are splitting open and Bloodthirsty are crawling out!
That is the largest Bloodthirsty I have ever seen. It must be the height of a hundred Spires!
Razogoth lives... that's where we must go.
Don't touch any Xeno weapons or armor. Most are rigged to explode!
That's insane! They will die with the planet.
Talking sense into them is not an option. We have to destroy them before they get to the ritual ground.
I leave you in the capable hands of General Agmeus. I must be off to prepare your other surprise.
Raider siege tanks have been sighted! Destroy them!
Tabitha, give me something on this walker.
Reports indicate Raider build, reinforced steel plate and three pilots. The Vegawalker.
What is Project Purger?
It's a walking death machine. It's capable of destroying anything in its path and protected with near impenetrable armor.
The Bloodthirsty are most likely concentrated by old Enclave habitations. That's also where the shuttles will be.
Raiders, support the commander fighting Halcyon.
Your fate is sealed now!
That's it, all guns aim for Excelsitus. The Xeno invasion will end before it begins!
Stay down and move between rock formations. Hopefully we won't draw it's attention until we're on it.
I need to find Octane, but I can't let the Righteous get away. If they are summoning another Sentinel, they must be stopped.
What's happening?!
The Vegawalker and the Tyr Cannon are fusing together! A mech that large will be unstoppable!
Before I defected to pursue Phobos, I was assigned to Project Purger.
We need to commandeer one of the transports the Xeno are coming in on. It will take us to Wyrmhold.
General Halcyon! Sir! My unit and I were posted in this station and tried to stand against the Raiders, but there were too many. I'm all that is left.
Then fall in line, soldier. You'll be helping us hunt Typhon Vex.
This place is the inverse of our world. We cannot allow you to become infected and join our enemy.
You will not get rid of us so easily, old man. My men are inspired by carnage!
We need to bring the array down or the Xeno will be able to signal their Worldship for reinforcements.
I have a plan. It is risky but it may be the only way.
What in the seven hells is that?!
A Xeno dropship! Take cover!
The Bloodthirsty are swarming all over the place!
We must be close to the Broodmother.
The traitor Katana and her dog, Yurich. Dispatch them quickly, Typhon is our goal.
Watch who you call a dog, you Imperial cur.
The Pantheon is powering up, we have to strike soon.
Vargas is heading back to his lab.  We have to cut him off.
He will expect that. Let him think we aren't pursuing and catch him off guard.
Something is wrong...
What's the matter, little human? Scared?
We can program the ship to continue the assault after we go through the portal. We just need to do enough damage to weaken the hull.
Well, figuring out the timing for that should be a treat.
How did we end up here?
Typhon merging with the core caused a powerful reaction. It killed most of our unit and knocked others out cold along with you.
Then portals began opening all over Tartarus. Those of us that remained grabbed who we could and jumped through. Unfortunately the Bloodthirsty followed.
The entrance has been sealed.
There was never any turning back anyway.
It looks like the Xeno are mining for something. I've never seen so many smelters.
We can't waste time here, Typhon gets closer to the Nexus every second.
Surrender Vargas. There is no way out for you.
You may win this battle Halcyon but once the GDR5000 is powered up, your tyranny will come to an end.
Typhon is ahead at the Nexus, but we have to cut around, the Blight is too thick leading up to it.
Righteous are all over our position.
They think we've been corrupted.
The Raiders have established some sort of dig site. They are burrowing through those gigantic walls.
They're still loyal to Typhon Vex...
Yes the Prometheus Device is mine! Malika, keep this old fool busy!
Gladly.
The Prometheus Device has warped Typhon. He's going to try activating the Nexus again!
The Bloodthirsty ignore him...
Tenacious aren't we? You've come a long way to die.
The Bloodthirsty consumption is spreading too fast. We need to take out the source of the fervor, the Blightbloom.
We'd heard reports about how he'd unleashed the Broodmother. The beast killed Raider and Imperial alike.
He plans on opening the Nexus and washing Acheron in the Blight.
That would destroy Kor as well... I will help you stop him.
You're in Kor territory; let the Raiders deal with the menace.  We have more important things to worry about.
Damn, there are Raiders all around that monstrosity. We'll have to take them down first.
Make these butchers pay!
Tabitha, I finally found you.
Octane, where have you been? Do you know what is happening?
I can explain everything, but we need to get moving.
The Broodmother! Aim everything we have on her!
Sir the Raider's hover tank has almost reached us.
Set up a perimeter!
Not since the Broodmother have I seen the Bloodthirsty act with such-
Intelligence.
Got it, looks like the Worldship has to stabilize itself in foreign atmospheres. We take out the stabilizer and the Worldship should come crashing down on its own.
What is this....fog?! I can feel a dark presence but I cannot see a thing.
You're so focused on killing Typhon, you've lost sight of everything else.
I will bury you, turncoat.
It's massive! What is it?
GDR-5000. Or as I knew it, Project Purger.
Alright Tabitha, lead the way.
We need to find the central command for this ship.
If they wish to lay down their lives then I say we take them.
Yurich! You've led the Imperials here?  You trai-
Enough of the traitor talk. You're a threat to life itself, Typhon.
Ha, fool! I won't waste anymore time with you. The Bloodthirsty will annihilate you for me.
They are coming at us from every angle. We need a plan.
Octane, today we honor your many achievements. Your devotion to the Imperials is unquestioning and...
Lord Halcyon, we are being invaded.
The Raiders would dare attack on this day?
Not the Raiders sir.
Do you think you can lead the Imperials? Can you make the hard decisions?
Don't let any Raiders break the line! We need keep this position.
Xeno, coming over the ridge!
Those sores are larger! Maybe the Blight is trying to infect them...
Right, we won't get anywhere close to the Worldship without taking over one of the outposts it deployed.
How do we defeat a Sentinel?
You don't you will be collateral in its destruction of the reawakened Progenitors.
We aren't giving Typhon power. We were trying to stop that madman.
Your intentions are irrelevant. To stop the Bloodthirsty resurrection, we must prevent the spread of the Blight.
You left that project over a year ago. Could they have finished it without you?
We weren't close to finishing, but if he accelerated production, it's possible. We shouldn't take any chances.
It's heading for the Spire; it must be programmed to take it out and stop the Phobos launch.
Alright I'm going in.
Come back in one piece. Alright men, all fire focus on the GDR-5000.
The Righteous are willing to die to protect the Pantheon. Let's oblige them.
Raiders are attacking the Spire! Commander, maneuver your men into position and destroy them.
Raiders were waiting for us! Fire!
There's too many.
Punch through, we take out Rastax we can pick the rest off.
Pending
We originally separated during a battle. You were knocked out so I had the rest of your unit take you to safety.
Then these Fanatics showed up and wiped everyone out. I barely made it out alive.
It is coming from the sky.
Intercept it. We cannot let it reach the ground.
Halcyon! You managed to drag your old bones all the way out here? It is all for naught. You will die now.
Alright we're clear to launch, let's go Octane we don't have much time!
That was too close.
No time to rest. We're heading right back into the fray.
You're wasting precious time, lay down your arms, die and make this easier.
I'm not your enemy!
The Nexus is on the other side of the Razor Mountains.
Scanners are picking up caves that run through the mountain. We can move through those.
Careful...there is Xeno equipment everywhere.
I have heard stories. It is the ancient Righteous guardian, Serapherus.
You can tell me the stories after we kill it.
Resistance is futile, the tribute will begin soon.
We'll bring you down with Evrane!
Look at their homeworld! It is completely engulfed in Blight!  All the civilians on board must be refugees...
The Enclave... their homeworld is gone?  Is this the reason for their invasions?
We've been scanned.  The Enclave knows we're here!
What now?
Plan B... Attack Rastax, the fleet commander!
What is going on up there? We are getting beat back and you are going for a joy ride?
Either we do this right or we hand over Acheron to the Xeno. Tabitha Out.
Use what you've learned Tabitha. Get into position and take it out.
We've got them where we want 'em. Focus fire on it's underside.
Sir, I'm reading increased energy levels from the walker and tank...
Sir, Jotun may be powerful, but the main source of its power was the Pantheon, without it, it's crippled.
We have a chance, let's seize it!
We've reached the Pantheon, but their defenses are as strong as Halcyon claimed.
The Bloodthirsty must be stopped. Your intervention endangers all of Acheron.
We'll find another way. Your barbaric ritual will end before it begins.
Out of the ashes Shiva will rise carrying our corpses to a beautiful new world. Where upon we will be resurrected with immortality.
Yurich, watch your step. The ground is collapsing!
It's massive.
It's a Worldship. It rivals planets in size and contains an armada large enough to occupy Acheron.
We're pinned down.
You traitors will get what you deserve; a shallow grave in Raider territory.
So what is the plan when we reach the controls?
Seize control of th ship, and then we dock with the Worldship.  We have to sabotage their warp systems to stop the invasion.
No, Bloodthirsty can't speak, can't-
Think? Hahaha, oh little morsel. I will drink your marrow.
Try and keep in it's blindspots. Take out the Raiders around it so we can clear a path to this beast!
Fields of bodies....as far as the eye can see. We need to leave this place-
They're moving!
More heretics! Burn them away!
Righteous? They've never been seen this far from their Council. They must have been alerted to the Broodmother's presence.
This blizzard is getting heavier the closer we get.
We have dealt with worse conditions before.
I will see you dead this day, Typhon!
Your threats mean nothing, old man.
A whole nest of Raiders sits at the base of the Relay Station. Cut them down!
The Pantheon is making the Righteous stronger than ever.
That's not all it is doing...
Bloodthirsty all around, but they are avoiding the Raider's completely!
Something is directing them. Keeping them away from the Raiders.
Our scientists are reporting that the Righteous must have been inhabiting Arctis for hundreds of years. How is that possible?
Who knows? Probably has something to do with the Neocyte. I will bet anything that is what is actually powering the Pantheon.
Your persistence is becoming tiresome. No matter, Evrane will destroy you as it brings us closer to achieving our salvation.
Halcyon, Wyrmhold has been secured.
Good, advance to the Worldship, we won’t be able to hold the ground invasion much longer.
We got problems up here as well. Rastax has returned, and is on his way to intercept us.
The Nexus shall ignite Acheron! We are nothing before its might!
I have fought too long to see everything taken away. This ends now.
How are we supposed to find a shuttle amongst all this Bloodthirsty and Blight?
Die, traitor!
Commander Lucina, Typhon Vex-
He'll die right after you.
Stopping the Pantheon now would be catastrophic. You are on a path that only leads to your doom.
I will not stand by and watch this world die. This ends now!
Once the Pantheon is destroyed we need to retreat. The reaction caused by its destruction could wipe us out.
These Righteous would kill every living thing to prevent any possibility of blight infection.
Barracus is getting away.
We got bigger problems. Xeno scouts up ahead. They must have detected the energy signals from the portals.
This is getting out of hand. I need to finish this before I become overwhelmed.
The Heart of Tartarus. The power of life itself...it's mine!
The ground is shaking.
Could be the drills.
No, it's too steady. Too rhythmic.
Are you prepared to continue on?
It was a distraction I will deal with later. Right now my focus is on the mission.
You're tired and your glory days are behind you. Step down graciously and spare this bloodshed.
I just got word on Vargas's position.
His time will come. For now, full assault on General Agmeus!
Stopping the Pantheon now would be catastrophic. You are on a path that only leads to your doom.
I will not stand by and watch this world die. This ends now!
Once the Pantheon is destroyed we need to retreat. The reaction caused by its destruction could wipe us out.
There has been an increase in Bloodthirsty in this area.
Then Righteous will be here soon.
Possible blighted individuals. Purify.
Why are you here Barracus? To follow us?
Ha! You always were short-sighted Yurich. Fine since you stopped me from completing my mission maybe you will do it for me.
The Righteous are summoning a Sentinel. It will eradicate all life on Acheron. No life, no Blight. It is the only way to stop Typhon, but you aren't willing to let everyone die are you?
The labs where these were constructed must be close. If we survive, we should look for them.
Halcyon, how good of you to come to my doorstep. Now I don't have to go looking to kill you.
I never agreed with Typhon. His bid at outstanding power seemed to overshadow his role as leader.
And now he threatens the entirety of Acheron.
Righteous have halted our previous advances into the Blightlands. Typhon might have slipped through but we must fight.
The Bloodthirsty are enveloping everything. Nothing is salvageable.
It's beyond that. They are merging and mutating with it. We have to end this; Bloodthirsty infused with Xeno tech will be undefeatable.
Situation is critical. Bloodthirsty have merged with everything from the Worldship. We cannot use any of it.
I'm surprised the Blight hasn't turned you. No matter, I have won.
More of those strange Xeno!
They look like they have some sort of infection. There are sores all over them.
We need to get as close to Excelsitus, High Admiral as possible without being spotted.
Right then, I'll have one of my men...
No, it has to be me. We only get one shot at this and any mistake will cost us everything.
Halcyon is a feeble old man! We need a stronger leader!
Good, I was never one for the safe approach.
Foolish girl, you'll perish here...
We forfeit our lives so that you may rain your fury from the sky. We call on you now, Shiva!
How has a structure of that size been here without us knowing?
A massive beast is heading right for us.  We need to get into position before it tramples us.
Ugh, what happened? Why is it so cold?
We're back in Arctis, and some friends followed.
More Righteous!
You're the reason this bane has been unleashed! Die!
My missiles will rain from the sky and strike you down! There is nowhere to hide!
Can you hear the Nexus? Hear it singing? So much power, so close!
We need to end this now, or Typhon will never stop!
Troops, flank the mad Halcyon.
I only want to save my people, Raider dreck. You are merely an obstacle.
I'll plot a course to avoid him and go straight for the Worldship.
There's no time for that. Fight through it.
The Broodmother? One of the oldest Bloodthirsty? I thought she was killed during the battle of Cleave Rock.
No. We had her captured. We had hoped to use her to build a weapon against the Bloodthirsty.
The controls are in the center. Once we're in we'll be able to start our assault on the Worldship.
That might have to wait. Looks like a Xeno fleet is coming to intercept us.
Move Tabitha, we need to take this transport before it's gone for good.
The Xeno are engaging the Raiders!
Typhon Vex is just ahead! We just need to cut through this unit of Xenos!
I have a chance. This is my one shot to bring an end to this.
Preparations on the Carrier are complete to take us to the sacred ground. You will die here.
Typhon must have ordered these Raiders to keep us distracted while he ran for the Nexus.
When we reach it, fire on it's exposed joints. It should be enough to damage it.
For a ship hovering over their own atmosphere it sure is well garrisoned.
Tracking drones indicate Typhon is growing closer to the Nexus, but the energy the Device is giving off is scrambling our sensors.
The Prometheus Device is resonating with the Nexus.
We're here.  After we clear it out I will take over the controls and guide us to the Worldship.
The Pantheon is charging up. The Sentinel will be here soon. Any idea how to stop it?
Blow it to Tartarus. Kill any that stand in our way.
Aren't there more important things you could be doing than fighting us?
After we have dealt with you we will extinguish the heart of Tartarus once and for all.
We will not let Aria's sacrifice be in vain. Everyone on me, for the Imperials!
The Xeno are retreating!
No. They are heading to the Nexus as well...
Full advance!
There is a chance, the reactor is deep in the Worldship Core. If the Bloodthirsty haven't gotten to it we can trigger an explosion that will wipe them all out.
We've mobilized medics to take care of the wounded. Drive the Raiders from Ashrock!
Focus fire and aim carefully. We only have one shot at taking Cyberius down.
That tower must be their point of origin if we take it we can scatter their remaining forces and pick them off.
This whole place... it's as if the ground itself is moving.
We need to keep going. Whatever Typhon has planned, it isn't good.
That thing is going to blow us apart if we don't flank it. Get in closer!
So it is settled, we destroy the Pantheon.
What makes them different from any other Righteous?
They're outcasts because of their beliefs. Most Righteous worship the Pantheons and Sentinels. They worship something else entirely.
We are in Tartarus-
Yes, birthplace of the vile Bloodthirsty. The air itself corrupts life.
Pending
More Righteous come with it, wait that one is not Righteous. What is it?
Your careless actions have awoken the Progenitors, the ancient beings whose slumber we were sworn by oath to protect. The Pantheon's reactivation will be next...
Typhon, Blight, none of this makes sense.
Barracus has also escaped from Tartarus. He must know something, make him talk.
Head for the base and secure it. Make sure no one escapes.
Sir, there are civilians here.
That was a direct order.
What is that noise? It sounds like screaming.
Hurry! We need to get to the vaults!
What is down there? What is the Prometheus Device?
How did I end up in the Swamp Lands. I can't even remember where I came from.
You are intruding on the ancient tribute. You will be expelled from this land.
Tabitha, status report.
We're approaching Wyrmhold.
We're being swarmed, take evasive action!
Your time is over, Halcyon! Our shells will punch through your armor. I will be triumphant!
